mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM approval_step s INNER JOIN document d ON d.doc_id = s.doc_id WHERE s.approver_id = #{userId} AND s.step_no = ( SELECT MIN(s2.step_no) FROM approval_step s2 WHERE s2.doc_id = s.doc_id AND s2.status = '01' -- 대기중 )

SELECT d.created_date , doctype.code_detail_name as docTypeName , docstatus.code_detail_name as docStatusName , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , d.doc_status , d.doc_id FROM document d INNER JOIN common_code_detail doctype ON d.doc_type = doctype.code_detail_number AND doctype.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail docstatus ON d.doc_status = docstatus.code_detail_number AND docstatus.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY d.created_date DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT d.created_date , doctype.code_detail_name as docTypeName , docstatus.code_detail_name as docStatusName , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , d.doc_status , d.doc_id FROM document d INNER JOIN common_code_detail doctype ON d.doc_type = doctype.code_detail_number AND doctype.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail docstatus ON d.doc_status = docstatus.code_detail_number AND docstatus.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE d.user_id = #{userId} AND d.doc_status = '03' ORDER BY d.created_date DESC

SELECT d.doc_id , d.doc_title , d.doc_type , d.doc_title , doc_status.code_detail_name as docStatusName , doc_type.code_detail_name as docTypeName , DATE_FORMAT(d.created_date, '%Y년 %m월 %d일') AS createdDate FROM approval_step s INNER JOIN document d ON d.doc_id = s.doc_id INNER JOIN common_code_detail doc_status ON d.doc_status = doc_status.code_detail_number AND doc_status.code_number = 'APV02' INNER JOIN common_code_detail doc_type ON d.doc_status = doc_type.code_detail_number AND doc_type.code_number = 'APV01' WHERE s.approver_id = #{userId} AND s.step_no = ( SELECT MIN(s2.step_no) FROM approval_step s2 WHERE s2.doc_id = s.doc_id AND s2.status = '01' -- 대기중 ) ORDER BY d.created_date DESC

SELECT u.user_id , u.user_name , cd_detail.code_detail_name as employmentStatusName , position_detail.code_detail_name as positionName FROM user u INNER JOIN user o ON u.organization_id = o.organization_id LEFT JOIN common_code_detail cd_detail ON u.employment_status = cd_detail.code_detail_number AND cd_detail.code_number = 'COM04' LEFT JOIN common_code_detail position_detail ON u.position_code = position_detail.code_detail_number AND position_detail.code_number = 'COM02' WHERE o.user_id = #{userId} AND u.role = '03' AND cd_detail.code_detail_number = '01'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO document ( user_id , doc_current_step , total_step , created_id , created_date , updated_id , updated_date , doc_type , doc_title , doc_status ) VALUES ( #{userId} , '2' , '4' , #{userId} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d %H%i%s') , #{userId} , DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d %H%i%s') , #{docType} , #{docTitle} , '02' )
